meanings.sent1: The blank CDs were labelable, so we could easily organize our music collection.
meanings.sent2: The new storage boxes were labelable, making it simple to identify what was inside.
meanings.sent3: I found a labelable marker and decided to tag all my notebooks with funny quotes.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a labelable file cabinet, neatly storing every detail of her past.
meanings.sent5: The labelable stickers were so bright and colorful, they made everything look more cheerful.

meanings.definition: Able to have a label attached.
meanings.sent1: The toy bins were labelable, allowing us to easily categorize the different playthings.
meanings.sent2: The folders were labelable, so we could mark them with different colors for each subject.
meanings.sent3: I discovered a labelable tape dispenser and went on a labeling spree around the office.
meanings.sent4: His personality was like a labelable map, showing clear directions to his true self.
meanings.sent5: The labelable tags were so sticky, they stayed attached no matter what.

meanings.sent1: The smooth surface of the jars was labelable, making it easy to stick on the price tags.
meanings.sent2: The boxes were labelable, allowing us to mark them with important information.
meanings.sent3: I bought a labelable printer and started labeling everything in sight, much to my cat's confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like a labelable canvas, ready to be filled with love and memories.
meanings.sent5: The labelable stickers were so versatile, they could be used for any labeling need.
